mapper.select: SELECT pn.notice_no, pn.title, pn.deadline, pn.deadline_add, pn.perfect_score FROM professor_notice pn WHERE pn.lecture_no = #{lecture_no} order by pn.notice_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT professor_notice(title, content, perfect_score, submitdate, deadline, deadline_add, lecture_no, professor_no) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{perfect_score}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{deadline}, #{deadline_add}, #{lecture_no}, #{professor_no})
